not_connected.title: Not Connected
not_connected.message: Please connect to a Boks to continue.

web_ble_not_supported.title: Web Bluetooth Not Supported
web_ble_not_supported.message: Your browser does not support Web Bluetooth. Please use Google Chrome.
web_ble_not_supported.ios_message: On iOS, standard browsers (Safari, Chrome) do not support Web Bluetooth.
web_ble_not_supported.ios_action: Please use the Bluefy app to access this service.
web_ble_not_supported.chrome_update: If you are using Chrome, ensure it is up to date or check your Bluetooth settings.

web_ble_not_supported_message: Your browser does not support Web Bluetooth. Please use Google Chrome.
web_ble_not_supported_ios: On iOS, you must use a Web Bluetooth capable browser like Bluefy.
offline_mode: You are in offline mode. You can view and manage codes, but cannot sync with the device.

community.title: Community & Support
community.donate_description: If you enjoy this tool, you can support its development.

browser.bluetoothDisabled: Please enable Bluetooth on your device to continue.
browser.noDeviceSelected: You must select a device to establish a connection.

version.update_required_message: Your Boks software is outdated (< 4.1.14). Please update to continue using the app.
version.unknown_hardware_message: Your Boks hardware version is not recognized or is incompatible with this application.
version.feature_restricted_message: This feature is disabled because your Boks hardware or software is not compatible or up to date. Please update your device.

master_code_required: Master code required for this action
